sources.title: Abducted The Carlina White Story
sources.description: A baby abducted at birth and raised by the woman who took her, eventually discovers she is a missing child, reconnects with her birth parents, and struggles with choosing between her two identities.

metadata.Plot: A baby abducted at birth and raised by the woman who took her, eventually discovers she is a missing child, reconnects with her birth parents, and struggles with choosing between her two identities.
metadata.Actors: Aunjanue Ellis-Taylor, Keke Palmer, Sherri Shepherd
